ModMetaData.name: LMC054.泥土道路
ModMetaData.author: 7H28J
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 1.0, it's finally here and I am sorry for the delay! 1.0版本的MOD终于出了！ adds Dirt Paths to floors, yep. Quality of Life mod, add paths inbetween your structures, or just paths for your colonists to walk on. 添加了泥土路。 提高生活质量的mod，在你的建筑之间添加路径，或者只是让你的殖民者行走的路径。 Consider leaving a thumbs up on my mod, I'd appreciate it!
